name: Urmă
description:
The forest is dark and lonely, but you don't have to stay there. Keep moving forward, stay alert, and mind the rabbits.

Urma is a free exploration based horror game.

For $5, you'll receive the supporter pack, which includes the 14 track OST + booklet containing artwork, and extra toebeans.

My name is doremi! I love cats.

Find me elsewhere:
https://twitter.com/jess_anca
https://planitia.bandcamp.com/
